game.name: Eric Cheating On Ariel
game.description:
How disgusting it is? The beautiful princess Ariel spots her boyfriend Eric enjoying with another girl when she went outside and visited a nearby shopping mall. It feels that he is cheating on her. She got very upset and has decided to break up with him. Now she wants to pack all the things available in her room and move away for a while. Would you help her during this tough time? Join Eric Cheating on Ariel game and be prepared to pull herself together and pick up some cool outfits!

The girl is very hopeful and relies on your fashion abilities. The picture of something she wants pop up on the screen and you have to click on it to transfer it into her suitcase. Make sure to pack all her items she needs to move to another safe place where her new love is waiting. You have heard it right. That handsome man is Kevin who wants a wonderful date with this pretty girl. It will be your responsibility to dress her up perfectly and make her look more gorgeous than before.

Collect all the daily use articles and then work on our dress part to make her look more charming in this html5 princess dress-up game! There are plenty of outfit, jewelry and shoes and handbag options to explore. We are pretty sure that you would not get bored for a single moment after checking out our new dressing games for girls that can be easily played on multiple devices. Enjoy to the fullest online, no download required on atmegame.com!!
